text:
Hello everyone,

Pop quiz for :beers: when you next meet me if you can help me out:

When looking at a new product (web application) what do you consider to be "must haves" for you to take it seriously?

Example: Products that have no ability to close your account in settings almost immediately get scored down in my books. 

How do you score/judge a new product?

 :sunny: Thanks :slightly_smiling_face: :sunny:
Does it do what I need, does it look as though it's going in the same direction as us
Does it have Apis and webhooks in a nice agnostic fashion if I want to integrate it into our process
<@U040MK408>:  Building a helper that observes using .on - is there a willDestroy event on a helper I can use for .off?
<@U03V2PZUB>: how invasive are they in terms of email marketing
if you dont have 1 click unsubscribe, I probably hate you already
<@U04TVTLQ8>: Webhooks / integrate it into our process. Very interesting! Thank you. Did not consider that. :beer:
<@U047GTU64>: Simple email marketing preferences :+1::skin-tone-2: Thank you. :beer:
